# Taquito Documentation

> Official documentation for Taquito, a TypeScript library for building DApps on the Tezos blockchain.

This is the documentation website for Taquito at https://taquito.io. Use this guide to understand how to navigate and find information.

## URL Structure

Documentation pages follow this pattern:
- `/docs/{version}/{page}` - Versioned documentation
- Example: `/docs/next/quick_start` or `/docs/23.0.0/making_transfers`

Available versions: 20.0.0, 20.1.0, 21.0.0, 22.0.0, 23.0.0, next (development)

The `next` version contains the latest unreleased documentation.

## Documentation Sections

### Getting Started
Start here for new users:
- `quick_start` - Installation and basic setup
- `tutorial` - Step-by-step tutorial
- `operation_flow` - How Taquito operations work
- `rpc_nodes` - List of public RPC nodes
- `web3js_taquito` - Migration guide from web3.js

### Operations
How to perform blockchain operations:
- `making_transfers` - Send tez between accounts
- `originate` - Deploy smart contracts
- `set_delegate` - Delegation operations
- `batch-api` - Batch multiple operations
- `staking` - Staking operations
- `consensus_key` - Consensus key operations
- `smart_rollups` - Smart rollup operations
- `proposal_and_ballot` - Governance operations

### Smart Contracts
Working with contracts:
- `smartcontracts` - Contract interaction basics
- `contract_call_parameters` - Calling contract methods
- `fa2_parameters` - FA2 token standard
- `manager_lambda` - Manager.tz lambda operations
- `multisig_doc` - Multisig contracts

### Wallets
Wallet integration:
- `beaconwallet-singleton` - Beacon wallet setup
- `walletconnect` - WalletConnect integration
- `wallets` - Overview of wallet options
- `wallet_API` - Wallet API reference
- `transaction_limits` - Transaction limits

### Michelson
Working with Michelson data:
- `maps_bigmaps` - Maps and BigMaps
- `michelsonmap` - MichelsonMap class
- `tickets` - Ticket operations
- `michelson_encoder` - Michelson encoder package

### Signers
Transaction signing:
- `signing` - Signing overview
- `inmemory_signer` - In-memory signer
- `ledger_signer` - Ledger hardware wallet

### Contract and Token Metadata
TZIP standards:
- `tzip12` - TZIP-12 (FA2 token metadata)
- `metadata-tzip16` - TZIP-16 (contract metadata)

### Views
Contract views:
- `lambda_view` - Lambda views
- `on_chain_views` - On-chain views

### Packages
Individual package documentation:
- `rpc_package` - @taquito/rpc
- `michelson_encoder` - @taquito/michelson-encoder
- `michel_codec` - @taquito/michel-codec
- `contracts-library` - @taquito/contracts-library
- `timelock` - Timelock operations
- `taquito_utils` - @taquito/utils
- `sapling` - Sapling (privacy) operations

### Advanced Topics
- `complex_parameters` - Complex contract parameters
- `confirmation_event_stream` - Operation confirmations
- `events` - Contract events
- `drain_account` - Draining accounts
- `liquidity_baking` - Liquidity baking
- `storage_annotations` - Storage annotations
- `tezos_domains` - Tezos Domains integration
- `ophash_before_injecting` - Get operation hash before injection

### Customization
- `forger` - Custom forgers
- `rpc-cache` - RPC caching
- `cancel_http_requests` - Request cancellation
- `prepare` - Prepare provider
- `estimate` - Fee estimation

### DApp Development
- `package_bundle` - Bundle optimization
- `dapp_template` - Starter templates
- `dapp_prelaunch` - Pre-launch checklist

## API Reference

TypeDoc-generated API documentation is available at `/typedoc`.

## Resources

- GitHub: https://github.com/ecadlabs/taquito
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@taquito/taquito
